title: Harold's fairy tale
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
brief_description: A timeless animation revealing what happens when Harold takes his purple crayon and the moon for a walk in an enchanted garden one night. Based on the children’s book by Crockett Jonhston.
